name: Convert for LM335
info:
V_LM335 = (273+T) / 100

Vin : 2.73V to 3.43V ( 0 to 70 deg )
Vout_scc = 0 TO 6V

--> 0 to 70 deg > 0 to 6V
Temp = Vout * (70 / 6.0)
